extension.name: FLEXIcontent - Item Form Tab / Fieldset / Custom HTML
extension.author: ggppdk
extension.description: Form Field Group Marker Field Plugin for FLEXIcontent. This field is used to mark the start/end of FLEXIcontent field groups in ITEM edit FORM. Group will appear inside Tabs/Fieldsets/etc. Take care to match all openings with a closing marker appropriately.

field.name: marker_type
field.label: Marker type
field.description: BE CAREFULL to match-close all open type of markers with an appropriate closing type. BE CAREFULL to which content types you assign the field to.

field.name: cont_label
field.label: Tab/Fieldset Label
field.description: Label of tab / fieldset / etc, only appropriate 'opening' markers

field.name: cont_cssclass
field.label: Container CSS class
field.description: CSS class of tab / fieldset / etc inner container, only appropriate 'opening' markers

field.name: custom_html_sep
field.label: Custom HTML
field.description: Enter the custom HTML code that will be placed between the fields
